title: yAva karmavO
sahitya:
yAva karmavO idu yAva puNyavO


caraNam 1    sattavanu etta hOda sattu tanna janmakhOda 
sattavanu umbuvanendu nitya piNDa ikkidare
    caraNam 2    eLLu darbhe kaili piDidu pitru triptiyendu biDalu 
eLLu mInu nungihOyidu darbhe nIroLu haridu hOyitu
    caraNam 3    eDakke balakke endu kELi eDakke tOrisi balakke tOrisi 
kaDu dEvateyana barisi kaThina vastu kELirutAre
    caraNam 4    mantrAkSateya kaili koTTu svargavannu hOgendare 
mantravello akSateyello avarello ivarello
    caraNam 5    hELuvanu ajnAni kELuvanu avivEki 
hELuva kELuva ibbara solla purandara viTTala balla
